p: A total of 7 patients with HF and 12 patients with COVID-19 in their hospital between 1 December 2019 and 15 February 2020 were enrolled. For imaging features, both groups had ground-glass opacity and thickening of interlobular septa, but the ratio of central and gradient distribution was higher in patients with HF than that in patients with COVID-19 (4/7 vs. 1/12).
